quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien, *The Fellowship of the Ring*

quote: I have no idea what I’m doing, but I’m doing it anyway.
author: Unknown

quote: To live will be an awfully big adventure.
author: J.M. Barrie, *Peter Pan*

quote: It’s not about finding yourself. It’s about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Sometimes you have to break the rules to find out who you really are.
author: Unknown

quote: Why fit in when you were born to stand out?
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: If you can’t be a good example, then you’ll just have to be a horrible warning.
author: Catherine Aird

quote: If you don’t have time to do it right, when will you have time to do it over?
author: John Wooden

quote: You’re only given a little spark of madness. You mustn't lose it.
author: Robin Williams

quote: The world is your oyster. So go find the pearls.
author: Unknown

quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: There’s no such thing as a mistake, just a lesson learned.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s a dangerous business, going out your door. You step onto the road, and if you don’t keep your feet, there’s no knowing where you might be swept off to.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien, *The Fellowship of the Ring*

quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
author: Helen Keller

quote: You can’t wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
author: Jack London

quote: I’m not afraid of dying. I’m afraid of not trying.
author: Unknown

quote: I do not fear death. I fear the unlived life.
author: Natalie Babbitt

quote: The more I want to get something done, the less I call it work.
author: Richard Bach

quote: You’re not going to get the results if you don’t have the courage to try.
author: Unknown

quote: Great things never came from comfort zones.
author: Unknown

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Sometimes the bravest thing you can do is to ask for help.
author: Brené Brown, *The Gifts of Imperfection*

quote: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Creativity takes courage.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: Find out what you like doing best and get someone to pay you for doing it.
author: Katherine Whitehorn

quote: The problem is not the problem. The problem is your attitude about the problem.
author: Captain Jack Sparrow (Pirates of the Caribbean)

quote: Don’t wait for the perfect moment. Take the moment and make it perfect.
author: Zoey Sayward

quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Gratitude is the best attitude!
author: Unknown

quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: You’re not going to get the results if you don’t have the courage to try.
author: Unknown

quote: Do what you love, and you’ll never work a day in your life.
author: Confucius

quote: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: If you’re not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: It’s never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: You don’t have to be perfect to be amazing.
author: Unknown

quote: You can’t stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself.
author: Jordan Belfort

quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.
author: Rumi

quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Creativity is contagious, pass it on.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Sometimes you have to create what you want to be a part of.
author: Geri Weitzman

quote: You can’t change the direction of the wind, but you can adjust your sails to always reach your destination.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: You’re braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: A.A. Milne, *Winnie the Pooh*

quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Nothing can dim the light which shines from within.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
author: Unknown

quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The key to success is to start before you’re ready.
author: Marie Forleo

quote: The more you give, the more you get.
author: Unknown

quote: What we think, we become.
author: Buddha

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Everything you can do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power, and magic in it.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: If you’re not living on the edge, you’re taking up too much space.
author: Unknown

quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
author: Neale Donald Walsch

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh, *Alice in Wonderland*

quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Don’t wait for opportunities, create them.
author: Unknown

quote: Dream big. Start small. Act now.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: If you’re not willing to risk it all, you’ll never know what it’s like to truly succeed.
author: Unknown

quote: Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally, it comes from what you do consistently.
author: Marie Forleo

quote: A dream becomes a goal when action is taken toward its achievement.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
author: Unknown

quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
author: Estee Lauder

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: When you are enthusiastic about what you do, you feel this positive energy. It’s very simple.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

quote: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says ‘I’m possible!’
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: If you’re not passionate about what you’re doing, you’ll never be successful.
author: Jeffrey Pfeffer

quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The more you give, the more you get. The more you get, the more you give.
author: Unknown

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: It’s not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Great things are not accomplished by those who yield to trends and fads and popular opinion.
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: Success is a journey, not a destination.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered, and the courage with which you have maintained the struggle against overwhelming odds.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: Don’t just sit there, make something happen.
author: Unknown

quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: Christopher Columbus

quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
author: Og Mandino

quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
